verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A song of freedom is on my Lips
Today, today
I sing about the one I love
Today, today

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
***All I can see is your mercy,
***All I can feel is your grace,

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Your love is so wonderful.
Let all the people sing that
Our God reigns above all.

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
All I can see is your mercy,
All I can feel is your grace,

verse.name: b3
verse.lines:
our God reigns above all.
Above all
Above all
Above all
